cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.HC. 

The paper discusses human motion modelling using deep learning methods, specifically recurrent neural networks (RNNs). This topic falls under computer vision and machine learning, which are covered by the arXiv sub-categories cs.CV and cs.LG. The paper also discusses the evaluation methodologies used in the literature, which suggests a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and graphics (cs.GR). Additionally, the applications of human motion modelling include human-computer interaction, which falls under human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
